name: null-events-session-browser
description: A responsive web interface to browse null community session data

scripts.fetch-sessions: node -e "const EventUpdater = require('./update-events.js'); const updater = new EventUpdater(); updater.fetchMissingSessions().then(() => require('./process-data.js')).then(() => console.log('Missing sessions fetched and data rebuilt!')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.full-refresh: npm run fetch-all && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev-full: npm run build && npm run api & npm run serve
scripts.sync: npm run update && npm run build && echo 'Data synchronized successfully!'

author: Null Community
